thread.title: Illegal Released Twice by the Feds Shoots and Kills Underage Girl Carrying His Unborn Son
thread.title_full: Illegal Released Twice by the Feds Shoots and Kills Underage Girl Carrying His Unborn Son

author: K. Campbell
title: Illegal Released Twice by the Feds Shoots and Kills Underage Girl Carrying His Unborn Son
text:
Authorities Bust Cartel’s $100 Mil Weed Farms in Texas 
The illegal alien was first arrested in January of 2011 in San Antonio, Texas, but he was released a month later, according to ICE spokeswoman Nina Pruneda. 
In April 2016, Garcia-Ramires was again arrested by ICE officials — and once again he was released the next month. 
Shortly thereafter, he impregnated Delgado — with whom he already had a son — before allegedly shooting her multiple times in the head nine months later, taking her life and the life of their unborn child. Advertisement - story continues below 
After the murder , Garcia-Ramires reportedly attempted suicide by shooting himself in the mouth, according to My San Antonio, but he was unsuccessful. After he was treated at a hospital, he was taken to the Bexar County jail where he faces two capital murder charges. 
This alleged murderer should have never been in our country in the first place, but thanks to President Obama’s “catch-and-release” program, he was able to stay here even after immigration officials had twice arrested him. 
Tragedies like this are exactly the reason conservatives have been adamant about securing our borders and enforcing our immigration laws.
